core.item

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.item.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Item>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Aprimoramento, Arma, Pocao

    public abstract class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Item>, java.io.Serializable
    Classe abstrata para representar os itens.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
